properties.description:
Author: Nikita Varnwal
Date: July 2023
Project - CRM Migration implemented under CGH######
Description: - This pipeline will load data from MS Dynamics (SQL server) Incident table to STAGE_CDI (Oracle) CRM_PLAT_DYN_INCIDENT_STG table.

activities.name: sp-TRUNCATE-CRM_PLAT_DYN_INCIDENT_STG
activities.description:
Name - Nikita Varnwal
Date - June 2023
Project - CRM Mirgation, implemented under CHG#####
Description - This stored procedure will truncate the table CRM_PLAT_DYN_INCIDENT_STG before loading any data into it.

activities.name: cd-TD_CRM_PLAT_DYN_INCIDENT_STG
activities.description:
Name - Nikita Varnwal
Date - June 2023
Project - CRM Migration, implemented under CHG######
Description - This copy activity will copy all the selected field's data from INCIDENT table from CRM to STAGE_LOAD TD_CRM_PLAT_DYN_INCIDENT_STG table.

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select INCIDENTID,
       TICKETNUMBER,
       CASETYPECODE,
       SUBJECTIDNAME,
       OWNERIDNAME,
       CASEORIGINCODE,
       NEW_CASESTATUS,
       TITLE,
       DESCRIPTION,
       CREATEDON,
       ASC_DATECLOSED,
       ASC_DATESETONHOLD,
       CREATEDBYNAME,
       MODIFIEDON,
       MODIFIEDBYNAME,
       ASC_BROKERID,
       ASC_BROKERIDNAME,
       ASC_CANNOTBESTARTEDSETDATE,
       ASC_CASETYPE,
       ASC_CHARITY,
       ASC_CLEANAPPLICATION,
       ASC_COMPLAINTID,
       ASC_COMPLAINTIDNAME,
       ASC_CORPORATE,
       ASC_DATAPROTECTIONCHECK,
       ASC_DATERECEIVED,
       ASC_DATEWORKSTARTEDONCASE,
       ASC_DAYSONHOLD,
       ASC_DAYSONHOLDCURRENT,
       ASC_ENHANCEDDATACHECKS,
       ASC_GIA,
       ASC_ISA,
       ASC_ISCASERESOLVED,
       ASC_ITHELPDESKRAISED,
       ASC_JISA,
       ASC_NUMBEROFCLIENTS,
       ASC_ONEANDDONE,
       ASC_ONETOUCH,
       ASC_ONHOLD,
       ASC_OTHER,
       ASC_PENDINGREASON,
       ASC_REASONAPPLICATIONUNCLEAN,
       ASC_REASONDPACHECKNOTAPPLICABLE,
       ASC_RECEIVEDAFTER3PM,
       ASC_ROOTCAUSE,
       ASC_SETONHOLDBYID,
       ASC_SETONHOLDBYIDNAME,
       ASC_SLADATE,
       ASC_SUBJECT,
       ASC_TAKENOFFFROMHOLD,
       ASC_TEAMSLADATE,
       ASC_TRUST,
       ASC_WORKINGDAYS,
       CREATEDBY,
       CUSTOMERID,
       CUSTOMERIDNAME,
       MODIFIEDBY,
       NEW_ADVISER,
       NEW_ADVISERNAME,
       NEW_BDM,
       NEW_BDMNAME,
       NEW_DATEACKNOWLEDGED,
       NEW_EMAILTOCASEQUEUE,
       NEW_REFERENCEACCEXECTEAMID,
       NEW_REFERENCEACCEXECTEAMIDNAME,
       NEW_REFERENCEASCENTRICCRMSERVERID,
       NEW_REFERENCEASCENTRICCRMSERVERIDNAME,
       OWNERID,
       SUBJECTID,
       asc_SIPP,
       asc_thirdparty,
       statuscode,
       statecode
  from DBO.INCIDENT
 where CASETYPECODE in (1,3,200004,100000000,100000005,100000006, 200001,100000003,100000001, 100000004, 100000002)

activities.name: sp-UPDATE_BATCH_AUDIT-CRM_PLAT_DYN_INCIDENT_STG
activities.description:
Name - Nikita Varnwal
Date - June 2023
Project - CRM Migration. implemented under CHG#####
Description - This stored procedure is updating all the required columns in the BATCH_AUDIT table in STAGE_CDI with the required pipeline run information.

Date - June 2023

activities.name: cd-CRM_PLAT_DYN_INCIDENT_STG
activities.description:
Name - Nikita Varnwal
Date - June 2023
Project - CRM Migration, implemented under CHG######
Description - This copy activity will copy all the selected field's data from STAGE_LOAD TD_CRM_PLAT_DYN_INCIDENT_STG table to STAGE_CDI CRM_PLAT_DYN_INCIDENT_STG table.

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select TCPDIS.S_INCIDENT_KEY,
       TCPDIS.S_CREATE_DATETIME,
       TCPDIS.S_UPDATE_DATETIME,
       TCPDIS.INCIDENTID,
       TCPDIS.TICKETNUMBER,
       TCPDIS.CASETYPECODE,
       TCPDIS.SUBJECTIDNAME,
       TCPDIS.OWNERIDNAME,
       TCPDIS.CASEORIGINCODE,
       TCPDIS.NEW_CASESTATUS,
       TCPDIS.TITLE,
       TCPDIS.DESCRIPTION,
       TCPDIS.CREATEDON,
       TCPDIS.ASC_DATECLOSED,
       TCPDIS.ASC_DATESETONHOLD,
       TCPDIS.CREATEDBYNAME,
       TCPDIS.MODIFIEDON,
       TCPDIS.MODIFIEDBYNAME,
       TCPDIS.ASC_BROKERID,
       TCPDIS.ASC_BROKERIDNAME,
       TCPDIS.ASC_CANNOTBESTARTEDSETDATE,
       TCPDIS.ASC_CASETYPE,
       TCPDIS.ASC_CHARITY,
       TCPDIS.ASC_CLEANAPPLICATION,
       TCPDIS.ASC_COMPLAINTID,
       TCPDIS.ASC_COMPLAINTIDNAME,
       TCPDIS.ASC_CORPORATE,
       TCPDIS.ASC_DATAPROTECTIONCHECK,
       TCPDIS.ASC_DATERECEIVED,
       TCPDIS.ASC_DATEWORKSTARTEDONCASE,
       TCPDIS.ASC_DAYSONHOLD,
       TCPDIS.ASC_DAYSONHOLDCURRENT,
       TCPDIS.ASC_ENHANCEDDATACHECKS,
       TCPDIS.ASC_GIA,
       TCPDIS.ASC_ISA,
       TCPDIS.ASC_ISCASERESOLVED,
       TCPDIS.ASC_ITHELPDESKRAISED,
       TCPDIS.ASC_JISA,
       TCPDIS.ASC_NUMBEROFCLIENTS,
       TCPDIS.ASC_ONEANDDONE,
       TCPDIS.ASC_ONETOUCH,
       TCPDIS.ASC_ONHOLD,
       TCPDIS.ASC_OTHER,
       TCPDIS.ASC_PENDINGREASON,
       TCPDIS.ASC_REASONAPPLICATIONUNCLEAN,
       TCPDIS.ASC_REASONDPACHECKNOTAPPLICABLE,
       TCPDIS.ASC_RECEIVEDAFTER3PM,
       TCPDIS.ASC_ROOTCAUSE,
       TCPDIS.ASC_SETONHOLDBYID,
       TCPDIS.ASC_SETONHOLDBYIDNAME,
       TCPDIS.ASC_SLADATE,
       TCPDIS.ASC_SUBJECT,
       TCPDIS.ASC_TAKENOFFFROMHOLD,
       TCPDIS.ASC_TEAMSLADATE,
       TCPDIS.ASC_TRUST,
       TCPDIS.ASC_WORKINGDAYS,
       TCPDIS.CREATEDBY,
       TCPDIS.CUSTOMERID,
       TCPDIS.CUSTOMERIDNAME,
       TCPDIS.MODIFIEDBY,
       TCPDIS.NEW_ADVISER,
       TCPDIS.NEW_ADVISERNAME,
       TCPDIS.NEW_BDM,
       TCPDIS.NEW_BDMNAME,
       TCPDIS.NEW_DATEACKNOWLEDGED,
       TCPDIS.NEW_EMAILTOCASEBODYRAW,
       TCPDIS.NEW_EMAILTOCASEBODYTEXT,
       TCPDIS.NEW_EMAILTOCASEQUEUE,
       TCPDIS.NEW_REFERENCEACCEXECTEAMID,
       TCPDIS.NEW_REFERENCEACCEXECTEAMIDNAME,
       TCPDIS.NEW_REFERENCEASCENTRICCRMSERVERID,
       TCPDIS.NEW_REFERENCEASCENTRICCRMSERVERIDNAME,
       TCPDIS.OWNERID,
       TCPDIS.SUBJECTID,
       TCPDIS.asc_SIPP,
       TCPDIS.asc_thirdparty,
       TCPDIS.statuscode,
       TCPDIS.statecode
  from STAGE_LOAD.TD_CRM_PLAT_DYN_INCIDENT_STG TCPDIS
 inner join STAGE_CDI.CRM_PLAT_DYN_CODE_TYPE CPDCT 
    on (TCPDIS.CASETYPECODE = CPDCT.CODE_NUMBER)
 where CPDCT.CODE_NUMBER is not null
   and CPDCT.CRM_TABLE_NAME = 'INCIDENT'
   and CPDCT.CODE_TYPE = 'CaseTypeCode'
